titles.title: A bill to establish a National Council on African American History and Culture within the National Endowment for the Humanities, and for other purposes.
A bill to establish a National Council on African American History and Culture within the National Endowment for the Humanities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
